name: Zita Site Builder – Elementor, WordPress & Gutenberg Website Builder
author: ThemeHunk

sections.description:
Zita Site Builder WordPress Plugin

Introducing Zita Site Builder WordPress Plugin: Unleash Your Creativity with Ease Are you looking to effortlessly craft stunning websites that captivate your audience and leave a lasting impression? Look no further than the Zita Site Builder WordPress Plugin! Zita Site Builder is a powerful and intuitive tool designed to empower both beginners and experienced web designers to create beautiful, functional websites in mere minutes.

Whether you’re a business owner, creative professional, or hobbyist, you can create a website that stands out and achieves your goals with AI Site Builder. Say goodbye to the complexities of web development and hello to a world of limitless creativity!

Documentation & Website Demos

Check the Demos : View Demo
Documentation : click here

EWith Zita Site Builder You Can Create Websites Like:

Portfolio Website
Business Website
Landing Page
Blog Website
Ecommerce Website
Store Website
WooCommerce Website
Company Website
Education Websites
Agency Website
Personal Website

ZITA PRO FEATURES INCLUDE

200+ Predesigned Templates
Fully WordPress Compatible
Multiple Plugin Support
Advanced Customizations
sections.installation:
1. Upload the ai-site-builder.zip to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
How can i get support if my Zita Site Builder is not Working ?

If you’re facing any problem while using our Zita Site Builder plugin, Please first follow the below steps :
1. Deactivate all plugins you are using and check if the problem is still occurring with our Zita Site Builder.
2. Check the theme and plugin version, if it is latest or not.
3. Check the plugin with default theme, to make sure error is not due to theme you’re using.
You’re free to contact us through mail, via our Contact form and Live chat support. We have also given full documentation of our Plugin, you can go with it and learn how to use our plugin.

How to Install Plugin

Just upload the ai-site-builder.zip to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory, and then activate it from ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
